com.ob1tech.CsvFileSorter.controllers

Class IndexRecordController<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ob1tech.CsvFileSorter.algorithms.sort.MinIndexedBinaryTree<T>
      • com.ob1tech.CsvFileSorter.controllers.IndexRecordController<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - ket comparable type used for sorting
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<T>

    public class IndexRecordController<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends MinIndexedBinaryTree<T>
    A record sorting implementation of a MinIndexedBinaryTree. Deal with persisstence and handling collisssions. When key are mixed for tow batches and some belong to the other batch, then we will nead to sort it out at doInnerSwap(IndexNode, IndexNode)
    Author:
    Madmon Tomer
    See Also:
    MinIndexedBinaryTree, Comparable
